articles.description: The Realme 9 Pro series is expected to launch in February 2022 globally. This time, there will be two models up for grabs.
articles.content: The Realme 9 Pro and Realme 9 Pro+ are coming to the stores near you very soon. Leaks have long rumoured a four-model lineup of the Realme 9 series at launch and it will be the Pro variants launching… [+1495 chars]

articles.author: Nithya P Nair
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 5G Olympic Commemorative Edition With Winter Dream White Colourway Launched - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Ahead of the upcoming Winter Olympics, Samsung has launched Galaxy Z Flip 3 5G Olympic Commemorative Edition in China. The handset features the Olympic logo on the back and is listed for CNY 7,999 (roughly Rs. 93,700) on Samsung’s official e-shop in China. It…
articles.content: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 5G Olympic Commemorative Edition has been unveiled in China, continuing Samsung's collaboration with the International Olympic Committee (IOC). Samsung has released the new sp… [+2707 chars]
